title: About those kled bugs I reported...
body:
Yeah, MAYBE hold off on fixing the W upgrade and E flash cancel bugs till I fully milk this Aram bug :P (You can't prove a thing!).

JK JK PLEASE FIX THEM ALL. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I know its gonna take for ever to fix this...so....
This is a minor bug that will not affect the game too much. Therefore it will take Riot at least 2 years to fix.
